knimeNode.name: Alpha Miner
knimeNode.shortDescription: This node applies the Alpha Miner to discover a Petri net from an event table.

fullDescription.intro: This node implements the Alpha Miner to discover a Petri net from an event table.
fullDescription.option: The column to be used as a trace classifier.
The column to be used as an event classifier.
The Alpha miner variant to be applied. Currently, five variants are supported: Alpha, Alpha+, Alpha++, Alpha#, and AlphaR.
